term.title: isomerases

item.text: Enzymes that catalyse intramolecular rearrangements. Isomerases are classified into racemases and epimerases, cis-trans isomerases, intramolecularlyases and other isomerases.

sources.item: PAC, 1992, 64, 143. 'Glossary for chemists of terms used in biotechnology (IUPAC Recommendations 1992)' on page 158 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199264010143)
